title: Understanding electronics: the transistor
creator_credit: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Joe Hayward and Helmut Engelhardt
brief_description: In this film the early development of the transistor is traced, its natural superiority to the vacuum tube is made apparent, and its many modern applications are discussed.
creator_credit_for_label: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Joe Hayward and Helmut Engelhardt
